contactAccount.note:
The Administrator and benevolent dictator of mastodon.se.

I post and boost mostly technology and federation related things. Sometimes history, anthropology, cute pictures, jokes and introductions from interesting people. Posts older than 6 months are deleted.

Free speech and expression are important but I have zero tolerance for any form of xenophobia. Never forget that we are human and we are all doing our best to live the human experience.

rules.text: Be respectful of one another
If someone asks you to stop, STOP. Ignoring such a request, especially from a mod, will result at minimum in a timeout.
If there is an issue, use the reporting tools so moderators and admins can handle it.

No bigotry or harassment. grandma.space has a ZERO TOLERANCE policy for the instigation or perpetuation of hateful speech and ideology, disrespect of its members or staff, incendiary behavior, or other such inappropriate conduct.
Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use nsfw tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.
Zero tolerance for illegal content. You will be reported to law enforcement.
Zero tolerance for hate speech.
Zero tolerance for posts inciting violence.
Zero tolerance for posts encouraging self-harm.
Be kind to one another.
Impersonation not clearly marked as parody is not allowed and will be hushed.

instance.title: Tweet Rex
instance.shortDescription: Great to meet new people, toot, and have some fun.
instance.description: Tweet Rex is a free and open social networking tool. Our only purpose if for people to communicate freely and have some fun. Common Sense Rules The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of tweettex.xo.uk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: - Excessive advertising - Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources - Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions - Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: - Racism or advocation of racism - Sexism or advocation of sexism - Casteism or advocation of casteism - Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof - Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: - Sexual depictions of children Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors: - Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that hasspecifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. -Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. - Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. Cross-posting "Cross-posting" is the automatic copying of posts from one platform to another. That definition does not include the simultaneous posting to multiple platforms from the same app, such as Twidere or PostyBirb. If you use those apps, we consider those posts original, and the following need not apply. Cross-posting from Mastodon to other platforms is fully permitted.Cross-posting into Mastodon from another platform is permitted under the following terms: - The posts do not include platform-specific references, e.g. talking about "here" meaning Twitter, or including text from other non-Mastodon users verbatim (e.g. cross-posted quote tweets) - The account is at least semi-regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored - The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted

contactAccount.note: I run this server. Following me is a good idea so I can tell you if there are any announcements that you may want to know about, like upgrades and downtime.

rules.text: No right-wing lunatics. Healthy political debate is fine, but this server is anti-fascist.
No anti-vaccine propaganda or fear mongering. The mods know people who have died from COVID-19.
Nothing illegal belongs here: no drug dealing, child pornography, death threats, or anything else that would be illegal in whatever country or jurisdiction you live in.
No hate speech here, period. Ever. It's 2022 and I can't believe I have to say that.

No minors. There are some jurisdictions where material posted by non-adults falls under some very strict legal constraints. I want no part of that, so if you are under 18 then sorry, please look for another server.

instance.description:
Folks, If you want to register here, feel free.  However be aware that this instance is a hobby.  I started it so I could join Mastodon in what I felt was the "proper" way.  I realize that many folks do not have the skillset to run an instance, so if this instance helps with that, awesome. 

It runs on 10 year old hardware in my basement.  I've got a ton of IT experience in keeping things operational, and self hosting is basically who I am, but as I stated, Hobby.  

You've been warned.  ;)

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people‚Äôs personally identifying information (‚Äúdoxing‚Äù) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@stellar.build
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on ‚Äî just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
Do not tone police. Even if someone else violates the CoC, it is not your responsibility to moderate them or criticize them for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them.

rules.text: Respeta la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de los dem√°s. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos aqu√≠, siempre que respeten y no da√±en a los dem√°s. Al mismo tiempo, ten en cuenta que los dem√°s pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminolog√≠a diferente a la tuya.

Racismo, machismo, capacitismo, homofobia, transfobia, queerfobia, xenofobia, antisemitismo, islamofobia y supremacismo blanco suponen bloqueo inmediato y, en caso de que los administradores consideren que esta conducta puede ser delictiva, una denuncia inmediata a las autoridades.

Se bloquear√° inmediatamente a toda persona o dominio que impl√≠cita o expl√≠citamente difunda ret√≥rica fascista, nazi, franquista, de extrema derecha y otras formas de nacionalismo violento o excluyente. En caso de detectar un posible delito de odio los administradores contactar√°n con las autoridades.

Se bloquear√° a toda cuenta o dominio que comparta enlaces o material multimedia violento o que promueva la violencia. Los administradores se reservan el derecho a informar a las autoridades en caso de que encuentren indicios de actividad delictiva.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantaci√≥n de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Se bloquear√° a toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud como el consumo y distribuci√≥n de drogas, los trastornos de alimentaci√≥n, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopat√≠a y la apolog√≠a de conductas da√±inas para la salud f√≠sica y mental de la persona en general.

Queda terminantemente prohibida la distribuci√≥n de textos, enlaces o material multimedia donde se incluya o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores, reales o figurados. Los administradores de Paquita podr√°n contactar con las autoridades en caso de que detecten posible actividad delictiva.

Paquita es una instancia libre de pornograf√≠a. No se permite a usuarios, usuarias o usuaries, trabajadores sexuales o no, que distribuyan repetidamente enlaces o material multimedia donde se muestre actividad sexual o fluidos corporales, aunque se haga catalogando el material como sensible y #NSFW.

Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez est√° permitido, siempre que sean desnudos propios de la persona que sube el material, sin involucrar a terceros, y que se catalogue como material sensible y se incluya advertencia o CW sobre este contenido, con las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity.

Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no est√° permitido el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por ello.
Se considera recompensa sustancial cualquier regalo al usuario por un valor superior a 20‚Ç¨. El beneficio propio por compartir cualquier enlace promocional ha de ser debidamente advertido.
Se bloquear√° a usuarios y dominios que compartan repetidamente bulos (especialmente bulos pol√≠ticos, cient√≠ficos o sanitarios) o teor√≠as conspirativas tales como la Teor√≠a del Reemplazo.

Queda terminantemente prohibido promocionar o distribuir contenidos relacionados con las criptomonedas, esquemas Ponzi o de econom√≠a piramidal, juegos de azar, apuestas de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados como no regulados.
Se proh√≠be la difusi√≥n de material multimedia o enlaces que muestren a personas en estado de embriaguez o bajo el efecto del abuso de drogas, tanto legales como ilegales.

Podr√° mostrarse material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco siempre con content warning y en un contexto de moderaci√≥n. Se proh√≠ben los enlaces para comprar o promocionar alcohol o tabaco en cualquier circunstancia.

Queda prohibida la difusi√≥n o promoci√≥n de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual acerca de las llamadas ‚Äúbebidas energ√©ticas‚Äù con alto contenido en cafe√≠na, cuyo marketing est√° dirigido espec√≠ficamente a menores, especialmente vulnerables.
Est√° terminantemente prohibida la difusi√≥n de material audiovisual o enlaces que muestren drogas ilegales o de venta muy restringida, como la marihuana.

Se proh√≠be aconsejar la toma de cualquier medicamento, requiera este o no prescripci√≥n m√©dica. Si una persona solicita consejo m√©dico y alguien habilitado para ello quiere d√°rselo, deber√° ser estrictamente en privado.

En Paquita se interpretar√° la insistencia en dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a una persona que no los ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto f√≠sico supone expulsi√≥n inmediata.

La legislaci√≥n aplicable en la instancia Paquita es la del estado de Espa√±a. Asimismo, no se permitir√° ning√∫n contenido ilegal en Alemania. Paquita se adhiere activamente a los principios de la Declaraci√≥n Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la Convenci√≥n de Derechos del Ni√±o.

En semejanza al concepto jur√≠dico de "buena fe", Paquita espera que sus usuarios se atendr√°n en todo momento al esp√≠ritu de la normativa aqu√≠ esbozada y no intentar√°n aprovechar detalles formales de la redacci√≥n de las normas en su beneficio.

instance.title: Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: This is the monogram.org Mastadon server. monogram.org started in 1999 as a community of likeminded people interested in open discourse about technology, arts, culture, and a better world. The domain monogram.org is inspired by Robert Rauschenberg's Combine Monogram. We got inspired, around 1994, by Monogram through the documentary series "The Shock of the New" where Robert Hughes discusses pop art and its influences on modern culture. The community around monogram.org has continued a sort of Flex Seminar through online forums and other activities over the years.

instance.description:
Esta instancia no esta siendo ejecutada en lo que se podr√≠a denominar un "servidor de producci√≥n". Esta instancia esta siendo ejecutada en una placa base rescatada de la basura.
Debido a esto no se garantiza la continuidad del servicio, por lo que simplemente la utilizo como mi instancia personal.
En un futuro moveremos el servicio a un servidor como se debe y abriremos el registro al publico, pero por el momento y como no podemos garantizar la continuidad del servicio, los registros de nuevos usuarios est√°n limitados.

This instance is not running on what might be called a "production server". This instance is running on a motherboard rescued from the trash. Because of this no continuity of service is guaranteed, so I am simply using it as my personal instance.
In the future we will move the service to a proper server and open the registration to the public, but for the moment and as we cannot guarantee the continuity of the service, new user registrations are limited.
GoXonLine

Play other shooting games and looking for an instance? Want to get into to touhou? Just looking for an anime-related place that is not populated yet? We've got you covered! We federate with a lot of other instances as well as using relays (currently 2) to populate our federated timeline and provide enough content and people to follow. We also have a set of rules in place tho that you should definetely check out.

instance.title: AnthonyJK's Personal Mastodon Page
instance.description: This will be my personal page where I will sound off on whatever is caught inside my head at the moment. Since I happen to be an Independent Leftist/Socialist who also happens to be unabashedly pro-pornography, pro-consensual adult sexual expression, and pro-sexworker/decriminalization and destigmatization of sex work, plenty of those thoughts will be NSFW and highly explicit. Therefore, membership here will be restricted to those approved by me who are at least 18 years of age, who aren't afraid of explicit sex talk. I will also use this instance to promote some of my favorite women of adult entertainment and special sex-positive people. This is NOT, however, a page for those wishing to use it for spamming their sites, or to post content stolen or taken from official talent without their approval. Any such spamming will be deleted and the perpetrator(s) instantly banned. Also, please refrain from tooting any pics or videos of your...members...without my or any of the other members' expressed approval. I am getting adjusted to using Mastodon as an alternative to Twitter, but it's a gradual process; so cut me some slack if I make some mistakes. Any professional advice on using this medium will be welcome. For those of you wanting to see a sample of my madness, go over to my Twitter timeline at: http://www.twitter.com/RGC_BPPA I am also a member of these Mastodon instances: @AJKSexLefty@switter.at (Switter, the sex worker instance) @AJK_RGCIndyLeft@mastodon.social (the main Mastodon social instance)

rules.text: 1) This instance does contain sexually explicit content and language. No one under 18 or who cannot view explicit adult content under the law will be allowed. Violators will be removed post haste.

2) Debate is welcome here, but be civil and respectful. However, snark or smack towards those who are obviously disrespectful or just being plain scmucky will be allowed at my discretion. To avoid that, simply don't be a schmuck or a bootyhole.

3) THIS IS A PRO SEX-WORK/PRO-SEX WORKER INSTANCE. My bias is clear and distinct; I am for full decriminalization of sex work and full and free adult sexual expression and exchange. Don't come here expecting to change my core beliefs; you won't be successful.

Consensual sexual adult speech and media is more than welcome here. However, it's strongly suggested for the sake of respect towards the squeamish and sensitive that you label any nudity or explicit sexual content as "sensitive".

Do not upload any content that does not involve legal consensual *adult* sexual acts, images, or language. Also, sexual content involving animals or children, scat, golden showers, or lack of consent IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED, and subject to instant removal and banishment of its provider.

Spamming of links to adult sites is strictly prohibited and subject to instant banishment. Linkage to official adult sites of performers is allowed, as long as it goes to the splash pages of the content providers, or to legitimate fan support sites. "Catfishing" to fake sites is strictly prohibited.

This instance is explicitly and very much Left of center. I toot from a sex-positive feminist/Independent Left/Socialist POV; and my opinions are mine alone. Take it as you wish. Your opinions of me do not matter, unless I make it so.

I reserve to myself as administrator and moderator of this instance the right to run it as I see fit, and my decisions are final, and not subject to debate. This is not a free carrier for abuse, hate, bigotry, poop posting, or otherwise hostile speech. Don't temp fate!

instance.title: Mastodon Uno Social - Italia
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon.Uno √® la prima comunit√† generalista italiana del social Mastodon.
Con oltre 50.000 iscritti √® il pi√π grande nodo Mastodon italiano.
instance.description:
Mastodon.uno √® il social network generalista Italiano parte della pi√π grande rete internazionale di social interconnessi liberi ed open source: Il Fediverso, un neologismo composto dall'unione di due parole "federazione" e "universo". √à un nome comune per i social network federati che funzionano con software libero aperto su pi√π di 6000 server in tutto il mondo e che al momento supera i 4 milioni di iscritti. Storicamente, questo termine ha incluso solo le piattaforme di microblogging che supportavano un insieme di protocolli chiamati OStatus. Con la comparsa e l'ampia adozione di un nuovo protocollo standard chiamato ActivityPub si √® creata un grande numero di nuovi progetti liberi che intendono dare un'alternativa ai social commerciali. I social network del Fediverso sono molto differenti rispetto alle piattaforme mainstream (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, ecc). In primo luogo, tutte le reti federate sono sviluppate da comunit√† di persone in tutto il mondo, indipendentemente da qualsiasi societ√† o istituzione ufficiale. Questo significa che puoi partecipare allo sviluppo e alla crescita del Fediverse. Tutte le competenze sono preziose: diffondere la parola, invitare amici sono attivit√† molto gradite. Un'altra differenza di questi social network dai silos aziendali √® il principio della federazione. Le reti principali concentrano milioni di utenti sui loro server. Questo d√† loro il pericoloso potere di controllare le informazioni e di accumulare i dati privati degli utenti, utilizzandoli a scopo di lucro commerciale (e chiss√† quali altr scopii). Le reti Fediverse sono progettate per essere gestite da chiunque: sei libero di scegliere e registrarti su qualsiasi server che ti piace, puoi scegliere la persona che si occuper√† dei tuoi dati - l'amministratore del tuo server. Se hai una ottima conoscenza tecnica, puoi amministrare il tuo server per i tuoi amici e la tua famiglia, collegandoti a tuo piacimento con migliaia di altri server indipendenti attraverso il web. In un certo senso, Fediverse √® un universo autonomo dove il potere e i dati sono decentralizzati e sparsi in pi√π paesi, mentre i siti web aziendali tradizionali si sono fatti ciascuno un imperatore (o un tiranno?) del proprio enorme impero, circondati da alte recinzioni, e riservano a se stessi tutte le decisioni, il controllo dei dati e la censura. Mastodon.uno √® interconnesso con tutte le reti federate ed √® interoperabile con ognuna di loro fancente capo al "Fediverso" ed √® la community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto segue rigidi criteri di affidabilit√† fra cui: ci sono pi√π di un responsabile tecnico disponibile 24h in caso di problemi, garazie nel mantenere il sito attivo online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio. Mastodon.uno √® inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui √® attiva la ricerca sul testo, che √® disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze in quanto richiede un'enorme potenza di calcolo.

Mastodon non ti obbliga a iscriverti con il tuo nome e cognome o con il tuo numero di telefono, puoi mantenere la tua privacy ed utilizzare qualsiasi nome, abbiamo solo bisogno di una email per la verifica. Oppure al contrario se desideri avere un account con una identit√† vericata/verificabile basta inserire un piccolo script che trovi nel tuo pannello di modifica del profilo all'interno della home del tuo sito. Oppure utilizzando l'app open source keybase per verificare la propria identit√† su pi√π social: keybase su mastodon.uno, keybase √® una piattaforma con cui si pu√≤ confermare che diversi profili social facciano capo a s√© (per intenderci confermi gli account che gestisci), in modo sicuro utilizzando la crittografia. I social commerciali come facebook e twitter negli ultimi anni si sono distinti per la capacit√† di disseminare disinformazione, teorie cospirazioniste e con lo scandalo Cambridge Analytica, la manipolazione dell'opinione pubblica. Inoltre le fake news, gli haters, la profilatura e la vendita dei dati personali a scopi commerciali. Questi ed altri sono i fenomeni problematici emersi solo negli ultimi anni attorno e dentro ai social network commerciali, Facebook in primis.
Facebook, Twitter eGoogle esistono vendendo i tuoi dati a terzi inserzionisti per sovvenzionare i servizi che ricevi gratuitamente, ma questo √® molto negativo per la privacy degli utenti, perch√© le aziende sono incentivate ad abusare il pi√π possibile della tua privacy. L'alternativa √® il modello di Mastodon... abbiamo una certa percentuale di utenti che donano ed √® questo che ci sostiene.
I social come facebook e twitter devono rispondere ai loro azionisti e aumentarne i profitti, usano gli algoritmi per creare la bolla di filtraggio: una gabbia rassicurante all‚Äôinterno della quale, grazie all‚Äôintervento dei dati profilati di ogni utente, vediamo quasi esclusivamente contenuti che confermano quelle che gi√† sono le nostre credenze.

Lungi dal mantenere la promessa originaria del web, ovvero offrire agli utenti un‚Äôinformazione libera e diversificata, Facebook e compagnia non farebbero che mostrarci quello che vogliamo vedere, tenendoci spesso al riparo da informazioni che potrebbero incrinare le nostre certezze e rendere la nostra esperienza sui social media meno confortevole, questo rendere sempre pi√π piacevole il trascorrere il tempo nei social ha come effetto un aumentando della permanenza e la dipendenza da social.

Se √® vero che i social hanno accorciato le distante e favorito lo scambio e la comunicazione a distanza, √® altrettanto vero che il prezzo da pagare in termini di rinuncia alla privacy e controllo sociale √® davvero troppo alto.

Simile a Twitter nelle funzionalit√†, le caratteristiche di Mastodon Italia sono profondamente e concettualmente molto diverse, al punto di farne una sorta di anti-Facebook. Anzitutto la tutela dell'anonimato, questione maggiormente critica se consideriamo la creatura di Mark Zuckerberg. Mastodon, invece, √® pensato e sviluppato per non pubblicare n√© conservare alcun dato sensibile, a tutela della privacy degli utenti. In questo senso, dunque, non profila e non detiene alcun dato personali a scopi commerciali o politici, non utilizza pubblicit√† o script che potrebbero profilare gli utenti e venderli per scopi commerciali ma si mantiene con le donazioni su Patreon.
Il software Mastodon non monitora tutto quel genere di informazioni che invece vengono registrare da piattaforme sociali correlate come Twitter, Instagram o Facebook: non calcola chi secondo lui potrebbe diventar mio amico/a. Non registra i millisecondi su cui mi soffermo su un‚Äôimmagine, gli errori di battitura, i like, il tasso di engagement o il tipo di relazione che intercorre tra me ed un altro utente, quale sia il mio lavoro, i luoghi che visito. Non geolocalizza la mia posizione. Come vedremo, Mastodon manco mi chiede come mi chiamo e non mi obbliga nemmanco a comunicargli tutti i numeri nella mia Rubrica. Inoltre, come vedremo, puoi far s√¨ che non sia in grado di leggere quel che tu scrivi. Il software Mastodon, insomma, raccoglie giusto le informazioni tecniche necessarie a funzionare.
Mastodon non √© legato a doppio filo al tuo telefono o ad una singola app, per cui puoi accederci attraverso una delle app per android e iphone gratuite e open source, ma anche se il telefono l‚Äôavessi perso o distrutto potrai utilizzarlo. In effetti si pu√≤ benissimo usare Mastodon su PC Linux, Windows, Mac e su qualsiasi altro dispositivo via Browser senza mai dover dare il tuo numero di telefono.
Il software utilizzato dai server Mastodon √© F.L.O.S.S. ossia aperto, libero e verificabile da chiunque. Qualsiasi persona capace di programmare pu√≤ verificare ci√≤ che il software Mastodon fa, esattamente come un meccanico che pu√≤ aprire un cofano, vedere il motore, trovarne i difetti, metterci le mani e migliorarlo
Mastodon, inoltre, viene gestito in modo collettivo, senza un vero e proprio padrone, ogni contenuto inserito rimane di propriet√† dell'utente, pu√≤ essere esportato e salvato per intero e utilizzato per altre piattaforme compatibili, in questo modo non si perderanno mai i contatti e i contenuti creati.
Mastodon.uno √® autogestito ed autofinanziato, non √® una societ√† che cerca di creare profitto dalla tua vita e dai tuoi contenuti. Il tuo supporto via Patreon o Liberapay √® fondamentale per mantenere questo servizio attivo ed efficiente.





Puoi seguire Mastodon.uno sui profili ufficiali:

Mastodon>

Pixelfed>.

instance.title: Mastodon Transit Authority
instance.shortDescription: People-, city-, and transit-oriented fediverse community.
instance.description:
ridetrans.it is a transit-themed (with perhaps a visual theme to match someday!) server operated in Seattle by a group of local bus enthusiasts. We believe that cities are for people, housing is a need, and transit is the best.

Our admin group includes folks with multiply marginalized identities and we hope you let us know what you need to feel more welcome here.

You should ideally know someone who is already on the server or someone who knows someone who is. But if you also just like trains and buses, put that in your sign-up message and you'll likely be let through!

contactAccount.note: This is the general admin and announcements account for social.ridetrans.it; you probably want a real human!

rules.text: Be chill to each other.
No spreading lies.
Everyone is welcome, mean it.

Try to only write root posts in English.
Replies are allowed in any language.
Boost are allowed in any language.

Why you want to join and what you hope to find here.
You only have about 400 characters (we will maybe change this in the future)

Have Fun !

Welcome to ClimateJustice.global

This is an official mastodon instance for activist groups of the global climate justice movement.

If you're an individual please sign-up at climatejustice.rocks instead.

contactAccount.note:
This is the admin account of ClimateJustice.global.
Here mostly admin related stuff will be posted and I'll mostly follow other admins to see what they are up to. If you are not interested just unfollow this account.

If you need anything, please contact me at @PaulaToThePeople for faster replies.

rules.text:
no private persons or political parties, just activist groups, NGOs etc.
exceptions have to be arranged with Paula
don't do anything illegal, unless it's the moral thing to do. that means it's okay to promote civil disobedience and similar rebellious actions for a good cause
don't do anything immoral
don't spam, troll or harass
don't repost retweets - if possible mirror from mastodon to twitter instead. exceptions have to be arranged with Paula

instance.title: Dragon Style
instance.shortDescription: I'm a grumpy queer dragon lady and this is my quiet cave for me and some friends.
instance.description:
Dragon Style

a Mastodon instance for dragons, and people who like dragons.

What's Mastodon? Mastodon is basically Twitter, except with less trolls and Nazis. And longer tweets.

It‚Äôs also Twitter without a whole bunch of VC investment that it needs to try and pay back by monetizing your eyeballs and keeping you on the site for as long as possible, regardless of whether that's by making you happy or enraging you.

And finally, the last big difference is that instead of living on a bunch of computers run by people working for Twitter, Mastodon lives on a bunch of computers run by whoever feels like running an ‚Äúinstance‚Äù.

Each instance can set its own policies. If you really want to be a jerk to people, you can find or start an instance that‚Äôll let you! But people on other instances can very easily filter out not just you, but your entire instance. The hope is that this will keep things more civil than what Twitter has turned into. The reality is that there are probably exciting new failure modes somewhere in the future.

The policies of this particular instance can be found here. The TL;DR version of is "Imagine you have a cool queer aunt. Don't do anything that'd probably piss her off."

rules.text: No bigotry, discrimination, or hatespeech. Race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, nationality, ethnicity, culture, etc. This instance is inclusive.
No trolling, doxing, or flamewars.
No "sex work." Commissioned art is fine.
No spam.
Self-promotion and spam accounts will be banned immediately. Some minor activity, like for independent artists or non-profits, is permissible.
Bots are allowed, but they may be muted from the public feed if they post excessively or come across as promotional.
NSFW content must be marked. This includes content containing nudity, excess profanity, or extremely graphic imagery.
Spoilers must be marked.
Be mindful of copyright and fair use when posting content. Flagrant violations will be removed.
Trigger warnings are permitted, but be aware that they are a bad idea. https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/talking-about-men/201703/trigger-warnings-and-mental-health-where-is-the-evidence
Be careful with how much you reveal about your identity.
Follow Wheaton's Law. http://www.wheatonslaw.com/

rules.text:
No discrimination against marginalized groups, based on:
ethnicity, gender identity or expression, sexual identity or expression, physical characteristics or age, disability or illness, nationality, residency, citizen status, wealth or education, religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Estonia/Europe will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

English preferred. Minecraft is a global community and English is the language that enables the most members to communicate with one another. This also allows us to keep the instance safe and enjoyable.
The contents of this instance should remain primarily about Minecraft. This includes all Minecraft related games created by Mojang Studios.

rules.text: Content warnings required. Use common sense with Content Warnings(CWs). Tag nudity, politics, violence, and kink content. Tag anything lewd, or inappropriate for an office environment, generally considered stuff the average person wouldn't wish to see at work.
Don't abuse crossposting. Crossposters from other services must be CW'd and set as unlisted.
Use image descriptions as much as you can.
Harassment and abusive behaviors are not allowed. This includes harassing other instances because you disagree with their policies
We have a zero tolerance policy for racism, sexism, homophobia, promotion of right wing/nazi ideology, transphobia, ableism.
Use mutes/blocks/filters where you can to solve disputes. We're not here to mediate personal disputes.
Admins are not interested in your data. As in, we're not here to snoop your stuff unless it's for the purpose of handling a report.

No advertising This means no accounts on behalf or brands, or accounts representing organizations and/or for the purpose of advertisement allowed. Exceptions: personal accounts promoting artistic services like commissions.

You must be at least 18 years of age to register. Although we aren't an adult-oriented instance, we do federate with instances which are, and we cannot guarantee the timeline to be suitable for minors.
Meta discussions should be CW'd and set to unlisted.

Do not engage in unsolicited mentions-bombing/blowing up someone's mentions. Ie, rapidly replying to another user at a fast rate, posting many/excessive replies in rapid succession, especially unsolicited, in which the receiver has no chance to reply or process the post before another comes through.

It was created in the wake of the Great Twitter Cullings of 2018, when a number of prominent libertarian accounts were suspended or banned.
instance.description: Liberdon is a Mastodon instance for libertarians, ancaps, anarchists, voluntaryists, agorists, etc to sound off without fear of reprisal from jack or zuck. It was created in the wake of the Great Twitter Cullings of 2018, when a number of prominent libertarian accounts were suspended or banned. Mastodon is a decentralized "federation" of community-run Mastodon servers which are part of an even greater federation called "the Fediverse". No matter how many users are on the instance you join, you can still follow and interact with the millions of users on any other instance throughout the Fediverse! This is a primarily English-speaking instance, although everyone is welcome. Enjoy!

fields.value: https://mastodon-belgium.be

rules.text:
Be nice to each other. No shitposting on this server.
Trolls will not be tolerated. Please act in a civilized manner.
No porn, explicit or violent media, racism, sexism, fascism, homophobia, or any other form of abusive behavior, harassment or hate speech.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No doxxing of users. Any form of harassment will not be tolerated.
No content illegal in Belgium or, by extension, EU law.

No intentional spreading of fake news, false information or misleading content.
This includes attempts to impersonate Mastodon staff.
No spam or advertising.

Politics and religion is tolerated but discouraged. Please use a Content Warning if you do post them.
Whatever your political or religious view may be is your concern but we'd appreciate it if you wouldn't use this platform to plaster it in other people's faces.

Please don't bring discussions from other Social Media channels over to Mastodon.
If you want to discuss a topic, please do it on the originating side.

If you're a commercial or government entity or you represent one, please consider hosting your own Mastodon instance.
This instance is set up and paid for by volunteers in order to give users access to the Fediverse.
It's not intended to be used as a commercial or governmental platform.

This is a private Mastodon instance, access to this server is a privilege and not a right.
The right to access and/or use this server may be revoked at any given time.

Interpretation of these rules is up to the server's admin discretion and is not open for discussion.
They may change without prior notice.

instance.title: social.yesterweb.org
instance.shortDescription: The Yesterweb is a community which acknowledges that today's internet is lacking in creativity, self-expression, and good digital social infrastructure and wants to change that.
instance.description:
This community didn't emerge from within the tech industry, but from outside of it. It is driven by everyday users of the internet, regular people with diverse skills and interests who care about online spaces.

We acknowledge that the internet is made up of human beings. Conversing online doesn't make this any different. Behind every username is a real person with their own perspective and experiences.

We do not tolerate hate speech including sexism, racism, homophobia, transphobia, chauvinism, and national/religious discrimination. We can do better.

It's not just about nostalgia or retro aesthetics but these interests signify that there is a need for change. Our goal is to forge a new path forward, toward building and cultivating a better internet.

It also hosts several bots developed with Platypush that mirror content from other sources or social media. However, as it grew it started covering more and more topics. You can see it as a general gateway to the Fediverse, even though most of the content is still about tech and science.

rules.text: Be nice to people. No unnecessary drama and offenses.
No spam. Avoid shitposting. Keep the signal/noise ratio high.
No trolling. Trolls will be banned with no appeal.
Any discrimination or offense on the basis of gender, color, place of birth, sexual orientation, religion (or lack of), political beliefs, disability, appearance is strictly forbidden.

Far-right/alt-right instances/users get banned. We're tolerant towards everyone, except those who believe in intolerance and discrimination as structural ways to maintain their privilege.

Civilized discussions between different political ideas are welcome, as long as conservative ‚áè fascist.
No nudity, unless it's about art. A lot of content on this instance is aimed at professionals in science and tech, and therefore NSFW should be avoided.
Child pornography and any other type of illegal content (where "illegal" means "in violation of Dutch, German or Italian laws") will result in an immediate ban and reporting to the authorities.

instance.title: Mastogram
instance.shortDescription: Music, Photography, Cars and Travel blogs.
instance.description:
Hello stranger.
It has occurred to me that one of the crucial elements of the early internet was the feeling that there was somebody out there, _somewhere_ on the globe, that was actually responding to that particular thing you were putting out there. It was a special feeling, because it was a sense of connection. Just being online and being part of the few select communities that existed back then was a commitment, and I believe that's in part what made it feel special.

With all the world gaining access to the internet, I think we've gained a lot, but lost this sense of wonder: Since online interactions have now become commonplace to the point of para-social meaninglessness, any single post or message doesn't really feel all that _real_.

Mastodon is still the closest thing I know to that primordial kind of internet, and so I'm putting this server out there. It might get forgotten and buried by Internet noise instantly, or it might survive, and on the off chance that it does and you find it:

I encourage you to use it to post here about whatever you're passionate about at the moment, however niche it might be. It might let you find some likeminded people and maybe recapture a bit of the best aspects of the internet in those early days.

In any case, I sincerely wish you a great day, from one surprisingly-real-but-currently-text-based being to another :)

PS:  No politics. 
PPS: Follow Oma.

contactAccount.note: The massive radiation exposure had failed to give him superpowers.

instance.title: Aspie Chattr
instance.shortDescription: A federated social network for aspies and other NDs to be themselves. Connect to the fediverse to benefit from a whole network of niche sites and follow people who share your interests.
instance.description:
Aspie Chattr is, above all else, somewhere to be yourself.

A federated social network for aspies and other NDs where you can chat to other peeps with ASD, ADHD, and related conditions. Discuss similar life experiences and your special interests or hyperfixations. Take your (metaphorical) mask off for a bit. You don't have to worry about "being normal" here!

Optionally, choose to see posts from the "fediverse" to bring in content from a whole network of niche sites, find ones related to your interests, and talk to other people who share them. Check out this post for how this works.

Privacy is a core value of the "fediverse" and we are no exception. We provide very flexible privacy controls for your content with no ads and no tracking. By default your posts are public but are not indexed by search engines. If you'd rather make your feed private and only allow those you approve to follow you, it's very easy. If you are happy to just float around the "fediverse" and share your thoughts across many different communities, you can do that too!

There is zero obligation to use a real name or post your face and your information isn't collected and sold to the highest bidder.

contactAccount.note: Welcome to the neurodiverse fediverse! Come along and say hi! #ActuallyAutistic #AspieChattr

rules.text: No trolling or harassment of anyone on this platform or others connected through federation.
No discrimination based on any protected characteristic of anyone on this platform or others connected through federation.

No personal attacks against other users of this platform or others linked through federation. It is perfectly acceptable for users to disagree with each other sometimes. You can either ignore it or debate the issue at hand. But in a rational debate you attack the idea, not the individual.
No releasing personal information on anyone, member of this site or not, against their will aka doxxing.
No spamming advertising of any kind, even if the links are autism related. No, we don't want your referral links for cheaply made fidget spinners.
No posting of nsfw content without using a nsfw tag on the post in question.
No conducting illicit activity using this platform and/or via federation.
No creating new accounts to circumvent bans. Alt accounts are permitted if you prefer to separate your activities and personas so long as you stay within the rules on all accounts.

rules.text: Racism, homophobia, antisemitism, transphobia, classism against the working class, ableism, exclusionary behavior, misogyny, genocide denial, harassment, Islamophobia, and other similar hate is not permitted. I will personally blast you into the sun.
Use content warnings for various topics, such as sexual content, mental health, food, and other touchy topics at your own discretion. If a content warning is required, the admins will let you know.
Don't advertise or spam. Asking for money is alright, but this is not a space to solely sell a product without somehow being tied to a user.
As a general rule of thumb, images should be captioned. If you are for whatever reason unable to caption an image, please add the content warning "uncaptioned image" or something akin.

Illegal content is not allowed. Despite the knowledge that some laws are unjust, types.pl does not endorse illegal action. This specifically lies under the jurisdiction of the United States, as that is where the servers are located.
If you are using a Twitter crossposter, you should be posting content on Mastodon as well. If the large majority of your posts are Twitter crossposts, you will be banned.
Administrators reserve the right to defederate with instances or boot users off the instance at their will for any reason.

instance.description:
Artisan.Chat ‚Äî a place for creativity of all kinds, from hobby crafts to studio craft, applied arts to fine arts, all are welcome! Make ArtiChat your new fediverse home; in addition to your works-in-progress, daily random and fun banter, commentary and cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' creativity is welcome too. Welcome to y/our ad-free and open source decentralized creative social life. Please read about ArtiChat's etiquette and other stuff before signup. There are mobile apps on both app stores ‚Äî we recommend Metatext (iOS) and Tusky (Android).
ArtiChat is donation-supported and ad-free. Your support via Patreon is appreciated.

rules.text: No trolling, microaggressions, or harassment. See the Code of Conduct for the full list.
ArtiChat has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying ‚Äî your account will be immediately suspended.
Respect other users' boundaries.

Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (for sensitive text) and/or Mark Media Sensitive (for media).
Posting the same content on multiple instances in order to spam local and/or federated timelines is not permitted. (Use the Unlisted option.)
No NFT content. None at all. There are cryptocurrency-related instances that would be more suitable.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion.
No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam (this does *not* mean your shop links and commission pages! Please share those often!).
No AI art. None at all. Mastodon.Art would be more suitable (with proper tagging).

rules.text: Please don't post anything that's illegal in the US or EU.

rules.text: Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia) and fight in direct messages.

Please keep bad memes or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.  
Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

Not safe for work (NSFW) content is allowed if you put it behind both a #NSFW tag and add a content warning (the "CW" button below the message text box). 
Content depicting sexualized minors (including drawn, a.k.a. loli/shota), self-harm, gore and rape is not allowed.
As stated in our ToS you must be 16 of age or more to use this instance.
Don't make parody accounts or try to impersonate someone or a group.

Accounts for for-profit companies or used for advertising only, SEO boosting, or SPAM will be suspended.
If you truly want to participate in the Fediverse, please ask the admin for permission before joining.

Please do not use a public anonymizer email service (like temporary boxes or forwarders). 
You will be asked to change your email under a time limit or will be suspended. Self-hosted forwarders are exempt of this rule.
No promotion of cryptocurrencies or NFTs. Commenting on the surrounding news about it is still allowed.

Please put politics and activism behind CWs when posting with the "public" visibility. A few times is OK but repetitive ignorance of this rule will result in a limitation of visibility of your account.
Respect Switzerland's (owner's country) and Germany's (server location) laws.

rules.text: This is a safe and welcoming community. Abusive or antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated.
In particular, no hate speech or bigotry, including dogwhistles (implicit but deliberate discrimination through coded language).
No posting others' personal information or private exchanges without permission.
Do not continue to engage a person, or incite others to do so, after they have requested otherwise.
No content that is illegal in the United Kingdom, Germany, or France. This includes "grey area" content such as sexualized, artistic depictions of minors.
Sexual or sexually suggestive content must be tagged as such, with a clear content warning. Avatars and profile banners must be clean.

Same goes for artistic depictions of graphic violence or gore. Real pictures and recordings of gore and violence are generally not acceptable, you better have a really good reason. Shock value is not a good reason.
Bots are OK as long as they don't post to the public TL more than twice a day and don't interact with folks out of the blue. That means no followbots.
When in doubt about something you'd like to post, ask a mod. When in doubt about something you saw posted, report liberally.
We may take administrative action for reasons not listed here.

instance.title: myna.social
instance.shortDescription: Basic models of flocking behavior are controlled by three simple rules: 1) separation: avoid crowding neighbours (short range repulsion); 2) alignment: steer towards average heading of neighbors; 3) cohesion: steer towards average position of neighbors (long range attraction). With these three simple rules, the flock moves in an extremely realistic way.

rules.text:
Be good and kind to each other.
Give people's music a try.  You don't have to like it, but you also don't have to tell everyone you don't like it either.
Polite disagreements are fine but being rude will get you banned.
Invalidating someone else's music preferences, except for intolerant types of music (hate music etc) will earn a ban.
No advertisements except of musical bands or acts and related ads.  "My band is on tour" is fine.  "My cryptocurrency ad has music!" is not fine.
Links to illegal content are banned, especially music downloads you don't permission to distribute.
NSFW content without tagging will get you banned.
No spam.
If you're looking for Mastodon that rock / metal band, they're over at @mastodonmusic@mastodon.social (they're welcome to be here too but wow, epic namespace crossover).
No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion.
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France and/or United States, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.

Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).  Weird that this might happen on a music instance, but yet here we are...
Mastodon Music has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying ‚Äî your account will be immediately suspended.

No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam.  One big exception is direct posts by musicians about their music and concerts.  For now there's no rule on corporate posts, but if things get noisy and less-useful, we'll reword this to exclude excessive-profit-generating posts.

Prefer music purchase links over streaming links.  
(This isn't a hard and enforced rule, but musicians need everyone's support.  In other words, post Bandcamp or Store links at the top, and Spotify / YT Music links in the reply or comment whenever possible.)

rules.text: Discrimination, especially against minorities, is strongly discouraged. This includes, but is not limited to: Racism, xenophobia. Homophobia, transphobia, and other queerphobia. Classism. Gatekeeping the "queer" status (acephobia, etc.)
"Punching up" does not fall under the guideline above, and is allowed.

Usage of right-wing figures of speech are strongly discouraged. Please keep yourselves up-to-date on the dog whistles that are going around. Of course, this point will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis, as right-wing dog whistles are created to intentionally hijack everyday jokes and signs.

Advertising is strongly discouraged. Fund raisers, users of the site selling their own products or advertising their services are fine - we absolutely do not want corporations to advertise on here, however.

Posting media without media descriptions, also known as alt text, is strongly discouraged. We encourage you to enable the popups that warn you if you are about to toot or boost content that does not follow this guideline.
Don't spam. Of course, some jokes are mostly repetitive (common "fedi bits"), but use common sense on where to draw the line. If the local timeline contains just your toots, you're taking it too far.

Do not interpret these guidelines in bad faith, not even for "playing the devil's advocate". We are trying to foster a progressive community - if you have an issue with the guidelines, feel free to discuss it.

You must use content warnings for content. This includes obvious topics such as sexual content, assault, mental health issues, but also less obvious ones like food, selfies, pictures with eye contact to the viewer, etc. Even if you may not find topics triggering at all, this helps.
Any content illegal in Germany will be removed. We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow laws in addition to our own morals.

instance.shortDescription: Privately hosted community of friends and open-source enthusiasts in Linz, Austria
instance.description: This is a private Mastodon server hosted with love by someone who left Twitter, Facebook and the other social networks behind to explore better ways of social interaction on the Internet. For now it's an experiment to discover how Mastodon works and if there is an interest for people to connect. Ideally it becomes a space for likeminded people to share and exchange ideas about a wide range of topics. This server has some rules, most importantly to 1) respect the law 2) respect one another and act like and adult. Furthermore, this server wants to allow a free exchange of ideas but within an ethical and moral scope that public social networks lack. This means that things like misinformation, conspiracy theories, climate change denial, racism, xenophobia, homo/trans/*phobia and all other forms of intolerance and ignorance are not tolerated by the admin.

instance.title: Senigallia.one
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon √® un social network non commerciale, federato e decentralizzato. Senigallia One √® una istanza italiana offerta e gestita dal quotidiano online Vivere Senigallia.

Mastodon √® una rete sociale federata. Ci√≤ significa che nessuna singola entit√† controlla l'intera rete, piuttosto,come la posta elettronica, i volontari e le organizzazioni gestiscono i propri server indipendenti nei quali gli utenti possono interagire tra loro anche se registrati in server differenti. Senigallia.one fa parte della federazione mastodon e rispetta i principi cardine dei social decentralizzati: indipendenti, etici, liberi, gratuiti e autogestiti dalla propria community.

Mastodon √® costruito come una versione pi√π etica di Twitter e al momento √® il pi√π grande social network decentralizzato.

Benvenuti in una federazione di social dove gli inserzionisti non sono i padroni di casa.

Dove i vostri dati non sono confezionati e venduti.

Dove siete voi, non gli algoritmi, a decidere cosa vedere.

Dove puoi segnalare direttamente agli admin i contenuti ingannevoli.

Dove le azioni tossiche vengono tenute fuori.

Dove ti piace davvero passare il tempo.

Benvenuti sui social come dovrebbero essere.

Benvenuti su senigallia.one.

rules.text: Be Kind and Respectful. Don't be racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, fatphobic, etc.
Any discriminatory, threatening or harassment behaviour or content promoting or advocating said behaviours will not be tolerated.
Keep Your Content LEGAL! Don't do/discuss doing/link to anything illegal.
Consider others at all times. Do your very best to add image descriptions and mark images as sensitive that could be distressing to some, for example: spiders/snakes due to phobias.
Use of a Content Wrapper/Warning (CW) must be utilised for topics that may invoke a strong difference of opinion as well as lewd or suggestive imagery or text.
Credit other artists/photographers/creators appropriately when posting their work whenever possible.
No unsolicited / spam posts permitted. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, etc.
No impersonation of an entity or another individual. Your identity must be your own, whether this is yourself or your online persona.

instance.title: typo.social
instance.shortDescription: Welcome to Typo.social! This is a Mastodon instance open to any typo and type enthusiastic. We are offering this service out of sheer courtesy without being held responsible for any disadvantages.
instance.description:
Welcome to Typo.social! This is a Mastodon instance open to type designers, typographers, letterers, fontworkers, calligraphers, tool builders, foundries, historians, scholars, students and enthusiasts. 
We are offering this service out of sheer courtesy without wanting to be held responsible for any disadvantages.

contactAccount.note: This is the official typo.social admin account.

rules.text: Please read and understand our terms of service: this includes a code of conduct.
This can be a home for type designers, typographers, letterers, fontworkers, calligraphers, tool builders, foundries, historians, scholars, students and enthusiasts.

Copyrights have deep and complex issues that do not all fit in this box. However, in general, please make sure you have permission to post the media you want include in your message. When practically possible, within reason, due diligence etc. Make sure all materials are properly credited.
Be kind. These are times of uncertainty and this instance is growing at unprecedented rates. So, please, be kind, and welcoming. Help others, when they ask questions.
Typo.social claims no copyright over media and text posted here.

social.JUGENDARBE.IT ist ein soziales Netzwerk (nicht nur) f√ºr die Jugendarbeit.
Es ist dezentral (so wie E-Mail!), werbefrei und soll ein Ort sein, an dem Menschen unterschiedlicher Herkunft und Art sich austauschen k√∂nnen.
Es basiert auf offenen Web-Protokollen und auf der freien, quelloffenen Software Mastodon.

Oberstes Gebot soll die gegenseitige R√ºcksichtnahme sein. Die Tatsache, dass dies ein √∂ffentlicher Internetdienst ist und man sich nicht "real" gegen√ºbersteht, entbindet nicht von den Grundregeln menschlichen Zusammenlebens und einem Mindestma√ü an Benehmen.

instance.title: Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: This is a Mastodon instance for scholars of religion (any tradition, methodology, or period).
instance.description: This academic instance is provided by A. Vincent at a cost of approximately US$300/year. If you would like to contribute to the maintenance of this instance, you can donate here. When the instance is full, we will need donations to be able to open it up to more users. Until then, please let anyone you know in the academic study of religion (or cognate disciplines) that there is room for them here!

contactAccount.note:
Historian of Religion, based somewhere between Canada and Sweden. Promotor of #Religidons

Modern #Judaism #InterreligiousDialogue #GenocideStudies #PopCulture #MemoryStudies

rules.text: No proselytising.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, able-ism, etc.

No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others (e.g. falsely representing oneself as a member of a minority; services offering to write academic papers to help students cheat; vaccine denialism; predatory conferences or journals; overt pseudoscience such as flat-earther-ism etc.)
No spam
No impersonating other people
No harassment of any kind. This includes heckling, sea-lioning, and continuing to push a "robust debate" past the point that the other party has indicated that they are done.
No bots, and no group accounts; institutional accounts are subject to moderator discretion and must be operated by a single named individual.
No automated cross-posters from Twitter, RSS, etc. on Public privacy setting
No un-described images or video on Public privacy setting
No advertisements or apologia for cryptocurrencies, NFT's, or multi-level marketing schemes

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand)

rules.text: Be kind and respectful of others. This includes respecting things like pronouns, using content warnings as appropriate, etc.
Don't post anything illegal (duh).
Don't post anything designed to shock or disgust people.
This is not a NSFW server. I don't particularly care about the occasional not-quite-SFW post. I'm not puritan. But just don't make your account all about NSFW content. That's all!

Disagreement is fine, other opinions are welcome. Keep your discussion and disagreement civil and try to avoid ad hominems. If you venture into areas of denying other people's human rights, you'll find that you'll lose your rights to post here pretty darn quickly.
No threats of violence, etc.

I'll do my best to use a three-strike system and reach out regarding moderation decisions. But at the end of the day, this is not Elon's "public square". I don't owe you free speech. You can host your own Mastodon server if you want. I can, and will, make any moderation decision I feel is necessary.

instance.title: Thirteen Bells
instance.shortDescription: It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen. Welcome to 13 Bells, a respite from the commercial social media platforms.
instance.description: "It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen" starts the iconic novel, George Orwell's "1984". However, the expression of the clocks striking thirteen, or a thirteenth stroke of the clocks is an old expression which simply means, to ignore or invalidate everything that's come before it, a pretty astute corollary to the current state of the world. So pull up a stool, weary traveler, grab a seat by the fire, there are stories to be told.

contactAccount.note:
Admin: 13bells.com
Chat: @amiko:matrix.13bells.com

A shadowy flight into the dangerous world of man who does not exist. A young loner on a crusade to champion the cause of the innocent, the helpless, the powerless in a world of criminals who operate above the law.

rules.text: This is a benevolent dictatorship. The administrators of this site are donating their time and money to provide this platform, and as a result, reserve the right to delete, dismiss, silence, purge, or remove anyone at any time without explanation or justification.
We respect and support free speech, even when it may be personally disagreeable.
No illegal activity or activity which might be construed as fostering illegal activity.
No personal or ad-homenim attacks against other users, both local and remote to this server.
Do not engage in behavior which will likely result in this instance being banned or blocked entirely.

No overtly disparaging acts or comments which server no other purpose other than to denigrate a person based on their traits or characteristics. Witty memes and jokes are generally acceptable unless their sole purpose is to belittle or demean.
No Pornography. This is a private platform with limited public seating. Fine line here, but let's just say there are plenty of places for porn on the internet, this isn't one of them.
Spam or unsolicited commercial posts will be deleted and the offending accounts will be removed without warning
All Bots, parking account, parody accounts, or other similar activity is prohibited without express approval from an administrator.

Anything not covered by other rules above should be covered under our first principle, "This is a benevolent dictatorship" but ideally none of this will ever even matter since we fully expect people to behave as adults.
Accounts which are created and never used, aka, "parking accounts" will be terminated without warning after 30 days of inactivity.
Accounts which are not used within one year will be terminated without warning.

rules.text: This is an instance for a solo-user, me: James Gallagher. I won't be adding other users so the Code of Conduct below is a commitment on my part. I've taken it from https://mas.to/about/more as they're the first server I'm going to seek to use as a relay
No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content won't be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other instances.
No content illegal in Ireland.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.

instance.title: Saronno.one
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon √® un social network non commerciale, federato e decentralizzato. Saronno One √® una istanza italiana offerta e gestita dal quotidiano online IlSaronno.

Mastodon √® una rete sociale federata. Ci√≤ significa che nessuna singola entit√† controlla l'intera rete, piuttosto,come la posta elettronica, i volontari e le organizzazioni gestiscono i propri server indipendenti nei quali gli utenti possono interagire tra loro anche se registrati in server differenti. Saronno.one fa parte della federazione mastodon e rispetta i principi cardine dei social decentralizzati: indipendenti, etici, liberi, gratuiti e autogestiti dalla propria community.

Mastodon √® costruito come una versione pi√π etica di Twitter e al momento √® il pi√π grande social network decentralizzato.

Benvenuti in una federazione di social dove gli inserzionisti non sono i padroni di casa.

Dove i vostri dati non sono confezionati e venduti.

Dove siete voi, non gli algoritmi, a decidere cosa vedere.

Dove puoi segnalare direttamente agli admin i contenuti ingannevoli.

Dove le azioni tossiche vengono tenute fuori.

Dove ti piace davvero passare il tempo.

Benvenuti sui social come dovrebbero essere.

Benvenuti su saronno.one.

rules.text: Don't be a dick.
Don't embarrass yourself, don't embarrass the boat (aka this instance, admins, etc).
Don't do anything patently illegal, likely to get the instance/admins sued, attract the attention of any TLAs, etc.
Opinions of individual users of this instance do not necessarily represent those of the Admins and/or maintainers of this instance or any entity other than the user from which the originated.
Randos need not apply.
Admins have the final say in all matters involving this instance you're welcome to talk about and advocate for democracy but this instance is not one.

This is a safe liberally aligned space. If you think that Donald Trump, Ron DeSantis, Greg Abbot, Ted Cruz, Josh Hawley,  MGT...you should be getting the point by now...are the hero of any story there's a Mastodon instance for you! It's called Truth Social.
No soliciting, proselytizing. Be passionate about your passions but not everyone is a potential convert to your cause respect them if they ask you to move on.
Avoid Direct Messages. DMs are not recommended on Mastodon as they are NOT encrypted. Instance admins recommend considering Signal.

La Terracita anuncia su compromiso con el covenant de Mastodon (https://joinmastodon.org/covenant) en todos sus puntos.

Es la intenci√≥n de La Terracita de mantener unas buenas pr√°cticas de moderaci√≥n y transparencia siguiendo los Principios de Santa Clara (https://santaclaraprinciples.org/), en la medida de lo posible y adaptados a la naturaleza no-corporativa sin √°nimo de lucro de La Terracita.
El contenido publicado en La Terracita deber√° cumplir la legislaci√≥n vigente espa√±ola, incluyendo la RGPD.

Como en cualquier instancia de Mastodon, los mensajes privados no est√°n protegidos por cifrado. Los administradores de La Terracita se comprometen a proteger la confidencialidad, integridad y disponibilidad de las conversaciones p√∫blicas y privadas, dentro del marco de la legislaci√≥n vigente.
S√≥lo se proporcionar√° acceso al contenido o metadatos de conversaciones no p√∫blicas en presencia de una orden judicial.
La Terracita, a d√≠a de hoy, no ha recibido ning√∫n requerimiento u orden judicial de ning√∫n tipo.

rules.text: Be friendly. Any harassment will not be tolerated. Disparaging speech directed at individuals or specific groups is not accepted.

Promotional content: Promo is generally allowed as long as it is either relevant to the topic of this instance or closely related to the individual posting. The latter condition only applies if said individual has a significant history of non-promotional content.

Promoting harmful items: It is not allowed to promote potentially harmful items such as weapons, drugs, narcotics, items that can be considered harassment, cars (!), gambling or high-risk investments, including cryptocurrencies or NFTs. It is not allowed to promote anything targeted at minors.

NSFW content / Nudity: NSFW is discouraged, but allowed unless it can be considered harassment or the sole point of depiction is the fact that it falls into this category. NSFW tags are required. Porn is never allowed. NSFW content depicting minors is never allowed.
Consequences: Failure to comply with this code of conduct may result in immediate suspension at the discretion of the moderator.
Unannounced Changes: This code of conduct can be updated at any time without prior notice.
No SLA: At this time, I am not in a position to commit to any SLA. It's a hobby. I cannot make a uptime guarantee.

Safety Recommendation: Use a private relay email and a uniquely generated password. I may not always be able to apply the security patches as soon as they're released. Treat any data you submit to this server as potentially public data.
No Nazis. No "I'm not racist, but...". There is a zero-tolerance policy for Nazis. Why? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox_of_tolerance

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people‚Äôs personally identifying information (‚Äúdoxing‚Äù) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the saptodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email h.tammen@tammen-it-solutions.de

Toot in English, please. This makes moderation easier and it helps everyone on this server to follow the discussions. 
If you toot from your saptodon account to someone at another server in another language than english that's of course ok.

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on ‚Äî just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not ‚Äúshitpost‚Äù - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for ‚Äúshitposting‚Äù on saptodon.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on saptodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Abide by the law. Very simple. You can also be reported on the internet.
If you want to create a NSFW-only account, you may want to consider another instance. We are probably not suitable for you.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or the promotion of the ideology of National Socialism.

Recruiter? This is probably not your space If you are a recruiter or work for recruiter this may not be your mastodon instance. If you place project requests here we will suspend your account. You can of course discuss SAP issues with us.

rules.text: Don't be a dick. If you screw up and get called out on it, apologize and move on, and try to learn from it. This one is vague, but as the Supreme Court said, "I know it when I see it." Similarly, try not to take deep offense easily. Reasonable people can disagree without violating this rule.
No spam or advertising. You may promote yourself and causes you care about, but keep it reasonable.

Please make use of content warnings (CW's) where appropriate. Things that should definitely get CWs (but not limited to): violence, trauma, imagery associated with those. Things you can CW (but shouldn't feel pressured to): politics, media, sports?
Absolutely no: bigotry; racism; misogyny; xenophobia; discrimination on the basis of race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender, sexual preferences, body type.  (See Rule 1)
No advocacy of violence or inciting violence, including harassment. This one will get you banned quickly.
No commercial bots, follow bots, or any bots that annoy the admins of this instance. If you want to point a bot at us, please make it useful or something that elevates discourse.
No stalking or harassment.

Represent Austin well when interacting with the rest of the fediverse. If we get legitimate complaints about a user here from another admin, we will most likely take action to avoid being defederated.

rules.text: No trolling, microaggressions, bullying, doxxing, or harassment.
Respect others' boundaries.

Use the Content Warning feature liberally.  Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics.  If you have to ask yourself, err on the side of requiring an extra click.
Posting the same content on multiple instances in order to spam local and/or federated timelines is not permitted.
No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (including illustrations).
No content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism.  No conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions is disallowed and will result in a permanent ban.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia, casteism, and/or violent nationalism or the advocacy of any of the above.
No unapproved advertising or spam.
Bots must be approved by the administrators and are subject to all rules above.
Provably false content is subject to removal by the administrators.  Repeated posting of disinformation or intentional misinformation will result in a permanent ban.
In plain English: Be excellent to each other.  Don't be Nazis.  Respect boundaries.

instance.title: discourse.social
instance.shortDescription: a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices, established by illumineX on November 7, 2022.
instance.description: Discourse.social is a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices. We founded Discourse.social because we believe that social media may have accidentally become an essential part of the global discourse for democracy. That global conversation probably won't be happening on Twitter, the platform on which it first emerged, for very much longer. Still, the conversation and the social graph that makes it possible has become vital. If you agree, please feel free to join us. If you would like to create a profile here, send email to me at: moose@discourse.social and include a link to your blog, Twitter profile or other social media presence, to help us see who you are. It helps us determine that you're not an imposter if you set up a profile at illumineX maker of EyeSpy, the cartoon eyes toy for Mac. We also make scalable mobile app and cloud systems for enterprise, government, and venture-capital-funded startup companies.

Hi! This is Suryo!

This is a personal instance and I intend to use it only for my own learning, research, understanding of the fediverse, and for some friends. The amount of resources I have at my disposal for this is very low and I will not be able to support many users at the moment. Sorry about that :(

That is why I intend to keep it small. In the future, if and when I am able to afford more resources, I might make this instance public or create another instance.

Other than that, I'm interested in a variety of topics in science, tech, and DIY, and I play the guitar in my spare time.

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, able-ism, etc. will be tolerated.
No impersonating other people.
No harassment of any kind.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand).
No advertisements for cryptocurrencies, NFT's, or multi-level marketing schemes.
We strongly discourage posting un-described images or video on Public privacy setting.
We support self-identification/diagnosis as these are often inaccessible due to cost, biases and other factors. Questioning folks are welcome.
No cross-post only accounts from Twitter, RSS on Public privacy setting.
No serious dishonesty that is hurtful to others.
